The photograph is confirmed to be a real: 2. The objects depicted in the photograph represent a fictional concept of a human-dog hybrid.
The artwork featuring the human: like dog and her offspring is titled "The Young Family" and was created by artist/sculptor Patricia Piccinini.
The artwork is part of Piccinini: s exhibition called "We Are Family," which explores ethical issues related to normalcy, the human-animal relationship, the value of life, and the definition of a family.
